oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Post-war broach portrait of Sgt. Robert F. Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This broach portrait of Robert Frederick Johnson was created after the war. He served in Co. D, 7th Tenn. Cav., CSA. He was married to Sarah Madison Taylor Johnson. She wrote a Civil War diary, which was published as part of The Taylors of Tabernacle. TSLA has a transcription of the Civil War diary pages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Robert F.
